docs.title: Internal Developer Platform
docs.text: Reduction of complexity and cognitive load for the end user of the Internal Developer Platform.

docs.title: IDP definition
docs.text:
Platform Team Responsibilities
  • Infrastructure Orchestration
  • Application Configuration
  • Deployment Management
  • Environment Management
  • ABAC/RBAC

docs.title: Mission Statement
docs.text: Designing and building toolchains and workflows that enable self-service capabilities for software engineering organizations, ensuring application developers are shielded from the evolving complexities of the underlying infrastructure.

docs.title: The Team
docs.text: Platform engineers provide an integrated product most often referred to as an Internal Developer Platform, covering the operation necessities of the entire life cycle of an application.

docs.title: Not SRE nor Ops
docs.text: Reduce set of sane, proven choices of tools that get the job done and allow developers to build, deploy, and operate their services.
